hero.core_tension: Choose to front-load limited in-store drops now or wait and compete on Cyber Monday price rounds
hero.setting: Bright, organized store backroom staged like a war-room; racks with locked high-margin SKUs, partner brand packing crate
hero.composition_cues: Three-quarter angle, foreground operator at table signing a run sheet, tactile materials: kraft paper, matte metal clipboards
hero.persona: Head of Retail with Head of Partnerships beside them
hero.action: Deciding and signing the two-week exclusive Nov 29–Dec 13 pilot assortment and store list
hero.urgency_symbol: A small calendar with Nov 29 circled, shown as a stamped card on the table
props: branded crate labeled 'Pilot 20 Stores' (references S1 Exclusive Drop)
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting; confident highlights on faces and the contract; deep but clean negative space behind
hero.alt: Head of Retail signing Nov 29–Dec 13 exclusive drop pilot with Head of Partnerships

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings and radial paths forming a timing wheel; inner ring represents Nov 29–Dec 13 window
elements: tokens for S1, S2, S3, S5 placed on specific rings
metric glyphs showing early_window_share and footfall_lift embedded in ring segments
labeled nodes for 'pilot 20 stores', '30 co-funded stores', 'store-as-studio shoots'
signal_map.motion: Arcs show movement of demand from online peak to earlier in-store events; arrows along radial paths encode cadence (days before peak)
signal_map.palette: Muted retail neutrals with two highlight colors: high-contrast teal for early-window gains, warm amber for footfall uplift; materials feel like matte acrylic and brushed brass
signal_map.composition_cues: Top-down, scaled to show measurement spine; engraved metric ticks on rings to suggest quant anchors
signal_map.alt: CMO and Head of Partnerships reviewing timing wheel mapping early_window_share and footfall_lift tests

store list tablet with 30 highlighted locations
